items.sentence: If I were you, I wouldn't sign that contract.
I'm pretty stupid when it comes to computers.
I don't mind walking to the station with you.
Is anyone here interested in learning French?
Is anyone here interested in studying French?
You could tell Tom and Mary liked each other.
Tom couldn't see what Mary wanted him to see.
Tom had no idea that he was so badly injured.
Tom had no idea what was happening next door.
Tom had the feeling that something was wrong.
